justsudoku

Safe HaskellSafe-Inferred

Flag

Contents

  • Classes
  • Option Descriptions

Description

This module describes the flags permitted for the Sudoku application. The flags exist as a data type, and descriptions and long and short option flags are provided as well.

Synopsis

  • data Flag
    • = Graphical
    • | Help
    • | Version
    • | File String
  • options :: [OptDescr Flag]

Classes

data Flag

Datatype for command-line flags.

Constructors

Graphical

Enable graphical mode - --graphical, -g

Help

Show help - --help, -h

Version

Show version information - version, -V

File String

Provide a file to load from - --file, -f

Instances

Eq Flag 
Ord Flag 
Show Flag 

Option Descriptions

options :: [OptDescr Flag]

Describe all allowed command-line options.
